en_question:
The delivery tasks of a certain T Factory are shown in Table 7-5. The numbers in the table represent the delivery quantities at the end of each month. The factory’s production capacity is 400 units per month, and the warehouse storage capacity is 300 units. It is known that the production cost for every 100 units is 10,000 yuan. In any month that production takes place, the factory must pay fixed operating expenses of 4,000 yuan. The warehouse storage cost is 1,000 yuan per 100 units per month. It is assumed that there is no inventory at the beginning and none remaining after the final delivery at the end of June. Question: How many units should be produced in each month so that the delivery requirements are met and the total cost is minimized? Table 7-5
Month123456
Delivery (hundreds of units)125321
cn_question:
7.14某T厂的交货任务如表7-5所示。表中数字为月底的交货量。该厂的生产能力为每月400件，该厂仓库的存货能力为300件，已知每100件货物的生产费用为10000元，在进行生产的月份，T厂要支出经常费用4000元，仓库保管费用为每百件货物每月1000元。假定开始时及6月底交货后无存货。试问应在每个月各生产多少件物品，才能既满足交货任务又使总费用最小？ 表7-5
月 份123456
交货量/百件125321
